EmailTemplate.subject: Did COVID Do This To {{company.Company Name:default=My Store}}’s Foodservice?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: COVID-19 brought a lot of things: disruption, a run on essentials, a huge shift in shopper psychology. More consumers turning to c-stores to find what grocery stores ran out of. But it also uncovered an opportunity for convenience stores…in a surprising place. Foodservice. See the unexpected impacts of social distancing on c-store foodservice operations and how to adjust your strategy to become a go-to for consumers, no matter what’s happening. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> P.S. Customers also are hungry for safer experiences that they can control.
